A strange mark appeared on my forehead on Tuesday. I went to the loo before lunch and checked myself out in the mirror (as you do) and it wasn’t there, but when I returned from Lichfield the mark had materialized slap bang in the middle of my head. So what strange phenomenon caused this strange mark? I think I’m fairly safe as there’s not even a single six anywhere in sight, but it’s still a bit weird. Maybe it’s cos my brain has been on full-tilt crazy go-nuts power for the last six weeks, and it’s finally leaked. Who knows. Additional… A top ten five of what this mark could be: > 1. A Laser (Kris) > 2. A leaky pen mark (Starberri) > 3. Lipstick (!) (Rachel) > 4. Walked into a Door (Han) > 5. Self Obsession (Dr. Paul)
